definition: hesitancy/indecision/to waver
as if/(just) like/just as/still/yet
happy/carefree/at one's ease/variant of 預|预[yu4]/old variant of 與|与[yu4]
abbr. for Henan province 河南 in central China
(negative prefix)/not/no
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: Between these four ways, a less sagacious man would have remained undecided.
sentences.chinese: 在这四条路中，不如他明智的人一定会犹豫不决。
他的声音犹豫不决，吞吞吐吐。

sentences.english: Both sides still balk at his draft document's latest wording.
sentences.chinese: 双方仍就他的文件初稿里的最新措辞犹豫不决。

sentences.english: As if he were in pain or in some torment of irresolution.
sentences.chinese: 好像他很痛苦或者是处在某种犹豫不决的折磨中。

sentences.english: Nogood is ever done in this world by hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 在这世界上犹豫不决成就不了任何事。

sentences.english: Ko started pursuing Shen but Shen remained hesitant.
sentences.chinese: 柯腾展开了追求，沈佳宜则犹豫不决。

sentences.english: Also both these signs tend to hesitate when it comes to expressing their emotions.
sentences.chinese: 这两个星座往往在要表达他们的情感总是会犹豫不决。

sentences.english: It's time for Brooke to stop shilly-shallying.
sentences.chinese: 这时候布鲁克不能再犹豫不决了。

sentences.english: Hesitant, but erect, he walked to the front of the room.
sentences.chinese: 他朝教堂走去，样子有点犹豫不决，身子却挺得笔直。

sentences.english: But be imperative, shilly-shally heart going to tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 可惜势在必行，犹豫不决的心里打算明天再想。

sentences.english: Walden put on a dubious face.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔登脸上现出一副犹豫不决的神色。

sentences.english: The seven silly sheep Silly Sally shooed shilly-shallied south.
sentences.chinese: 那七只笨羊在笨萨利的驱赶下犹豫不决地向南走。

sentences.english: He has got the dithers about such kind of choice.
sentences.chinese: 对于这样的选择他犹豫不决。

sentences.english: I hesitate to spend so much money on clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我对花那么多钱买衣服犹豫不决。

sentences.english: There is no reason why we should boggle at a capital gains tax.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有理由要对资本收益税犹豫不决。

definition: to hesitate over what move to make (idiom); to waver/to shilly-shally
to hesitate/indecisive
indecisive/wavering
to hesitate to move forward/to hesitate/to hold back
indecisive/irresolute
to hesitate
to hesitate
to hesitate
to intertwine/to band together (with)/to link up (with)/twisted/tangled/confused/to be at a loss
to oscillate without pause (idiom)/to fluctuate/(of thoughts) to wander/to waver
to worry about personal gains and losses
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation
to make a decision/resolution/decisiveness/resolute
afraid of the head, terrified of the tail (idiom); ever fearful and nervous/afraid of the slightest thing
to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
hesitant to take action
